review: So very cool... I can watch pretty much whatever I want whenever I want and it's easy enough my 4 year old can figure it out.  The ONLY thing that worries me is the remote.  I have it up on a shelf because like my Bose system I'm so afraid this tiny remote is going to get lost somewhere.  So far, the whole thing works well -- I can watch my netflix nice and clear on the big screen (so much quicker and easier than waiting for a playstation to link in with the computer, etc. - NTY)  I love that I can also watch my Amazon Prime movies too!  This was really easy to set up (took about 10 minutes) but anyone can do it!  So far, so good - thanks Amazon!
author: C. L. Sheehan "wowgirl1975"
